Button Deprecated

This button is a restylized version of the Bootstrap 3 button. It is now deprecated and has been replaced with Pretty Buttons on guelph.ca

  • Button - Bootstrap
Button - Bootstrap btn btn-success

A button, reconfigured from Bootstrap 3 to match guelph.ca styles

    • HTML

Usage

Class Name Description
btn

This is a required class which identifies a link as a button, as defined in Bootstrap
btn-success

Tells a btn class it should be a ‘success button’. This is the class that was reconfigured for utilization on guelph.ca

Fine print

  • Version: 0.1
